definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The facility should have a process waste water discharge permit.
sentences.chinese: 受核工廠須領有加工廠廢水排放許可證。

sentences.english: All sorts of commonly-used technologies for controlling Cr-containing wastewater are presented .
sentences.chinese: 介紹目前比較常用的含鉻廢水的種種治理技術。

sentences.english: Treatment of restaurant wastewater with polysilicate aluminium was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以聚硅酸鋁爲混凝劑，用化學法絮凝處理餐飲廢水。

sentences.english: This paper presents the method of treatment of waste water containing nitrophenol sodium from dye plant.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了染料廠含硝基酚鈉廢水治理的方法。

sentences.english: A membrane filtrating technology for coal- sluicing wastewater at coal-fired power plants is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種處理燃煤電廠衝煤廢水的膜式過濾技術。

sentences.english: A graywater catchment system could collect reusable water for irrigation and toilet flushing.
sentences.chinese: 廢水回收系統可以用來灌溉，也可以用來沖廁所。

sentences.english: In this paper, macroporous resin was used to treat wastewater resulting from manufacturing sulfanilamide (SN).
sentences.chinese: 利用大孔吸附樹脂處理含磺胺廢水。

sentences.english: The application of pyrites in Coal Gangue in Mercury wastewater treatment is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用煤系硫鐵礦對含汞廢水的處理進行了研究。

sentences.english: These MBF had shown positive effects on treatment of four kinds of selected wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 它們所產MBF對所選四種廢水均有一定的處理效果。

sentences.english: The quaternary ammonium salt and hydroxy ethyl cellulose were contained in a special organic chemical wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 某廠特種有機廢水，含季銨鹽和羥乙基纖維素。

sentences.english: Of chlorination in water and wastewater treatment.
sentences.chinese: 是氯水投加還是廢水處理。

sentences.english: The chromium in industrial wastewater could be removed with the scrap-iron fixed bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 採用鐵屑固定牀反應器去除工業廢水中的鉻。

sentences.english: The cases are analyzed in order to illustrate the feasibility of wastewater treatment with thermophilic bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 通過實例闡明瞭利用嗜熱菌處理廢水的可行性。

sentences.english: The wastewater samples is transmitted by an air - operated aspirator to the liquid injection valve.
sentences.chinese: 用氣動吸引器將廢水試樣送入液體注射閥。

sentences.english: Advanced treatment of coking wastewater by iron-carbon micro-electrolysis process with aeration was studied.
sentences.chinese: 採用曝氣鐵炭微電解工藝對焦化廢水進行了深度處理。

sentences.english: The present invention can be widely used in the waste water treatment processes of various electroplating effluent.
sentences.chinese: 本發明可廣泛應用於各種電鍍廠的廢水處理過程中。

definition: Guangchang county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
